casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Roberts, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Roberts v. Indus. Comm., 139 Ohio St.3d 185, 2014-Ohio-2112.]

*186(No. 2013-0349 Submitted April 29, 2014 Decided May 21, 2014.) Agee, Clymer, Mitchell & Laret and Robert M. Robinson, for appellant. Michael DeWine, Attorney General, and Latawanda N. Moore, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission of Ohio.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated in the opinion of the court of appeals.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Kennedy, French, and O’Neill, JJ., concur.
